mainText:
Steve, you have enhanced the lives of the world. Without your genius, I could not work so efficiently from my MacBook Pro. Without your genius, I could not listen to the worlds musical offerings whereever I go on my IPOD. Without your genius, I could not communicate with the word so efficiently on my IPHONE. Without your genius, I could not be entertained on demand with my Apple TV.


You have done your job. Rest in peace because you deserve it. You should be a happy being wherever you are.
header: All I can say is thank you.
author: Ellen
